title: Weekly Roundup LIVE: Friday, February 10
description: News of the week, plus we ask what's next for President Trump. Recorded Friday night at the Warner Theater in Washington DC, in partnership with member station WAMU. This episode: White House correspondent Tamara Keith, congressional reporter Scott Detrow, reporter Sam Sanders, congressional correspondent Susan Davis, political reporter Danielle Kurtzleben, White House correspondent Scott Horsley, political editor Domenico Montanaro, and editor/correspondent Ron Elving. More coverage at nprpolitics.org. Email the show at nprpolitics@npr.org. Find and support your local public radio station at npr.org/stations.
